resources.string: Bluetooth Low Energy not supported on device
Did you know? Sea stars have no brains and no blood. Their nervous system is spread through their arms and their blood is actually filtered sea water.

Did you know? Male garibaldis are fiercely protective of their territories and they don\'t get sentimental after attracting a mate. As soon as a female has laid her eggs, the male chases her away before she has the chance to munch on any other eggs in his nest, then fertilizes the eggs .
